input_brief: From DA-002 briefs, generate 1-4 high-fidelity mockups per theme, including front/back placements and color variants.

mockups.mockup_prompt: Professional product photography mockup of a black crew-neck t-shirt on a mannequin torso against dark studio backdrop, front view, featuring a gold linework illuminati eye over capitol dome design centered on chest, clean studio lighting, e-commerce ready, high resolution
mockups.notes: Gold on black is the hero colorway. Test navy as secondary.

mockups.mockup_prompt: Frame mockup of a 24x36 portrait poster in slim black frame hung on dark concrete wall, moody ambient lighting, the poster features a dramatic golden all-seeing eye above a shadowy capitol dome with geometric light rays, interior design photography style
mockups.notes: Premium matte paper recommended. This is the hero product for T-01.

mockups.mockup_prompt: Product photography of a black pullover hoodie laid flat on dark surface, back view showing large all-seeing eye and capitol dome design spanning the full back, gold and dark red tones on black fabric, overhead flat-lay style, e-commerce ready
mockups.notes: Front: small eye logo left-chest. Back: full illustration.

mockups.mockup_prompt: Product photography of a white ceramic 11oz mug on a dark desk with soft lighting, wrap-around print of a cyberpunk cityscape at night with neon green cryptic symbols on building facades, steam rising from the mug, lifestyle shot
mockups.notes: Panoramic design wraps naturally. Crop handles area carefully.

mockups.mockup_prompt: Lifestyle mockup of a large gaming desk mat on a dark desk setup with keyboard and mouse, the mat features a wide panoramic cyberpunk cityscape with teal and neon green cipher symbols, ambient RGB lighting in background, gamer aesthetic photography
mockups.notes: Landscape format is perfect for desk mats. High-margin product.

mockups.mockup_prompt: Product mockup of a black t-shirt on a model in urban setting, front view, square chest print of a flat minimalist city skyline with glowing cryptic symbols in windows, teal and green on black, streetwear photography style
mockups.notes: Square crop of the V2 flat version for chest print.

mockups.mockup_prompt: Clean product photography of a white crew-neck t-shirt on a model against white studio backdrop, front view, bold black redaction bars with visible words 'WHAT ARE THEY HIDING' between bars, red accent line at top, minimal high-contrast design, fashion editorial style
mockups.notes: Light shirt hero. The simplicity makes this very versatile.

mockups.mockup_prompt: Product photography of a black crew-neck t-shirt on a model in moody studio lighting, front view, white redaction bars with visible text between them, red CLASSIFIED stamp accent, inverted color scheme for dark garment, streetwear style
mockups.notes: Same design inverted for dark tees. Test both to see which sells.

mockups.mockup_prompt: Frame mockup of an 18x24 poster in a simple white frame on a light wall, the poster shows a photorealistic aged classified document with heavy black redaction bars and coffee stains, red CLASSIFIED stamp, paper texture visible, art gallery style presentation
mockups.notes: Art print version. Could also work as a smaller 11x17.

mockups.mockup_prompt: Flat-lay product photo of die-cut vinyl stickers scattered on a dark surface, red CLASSIFIED stamp design with distressed texture edges, various sizes, laptop and water bottle visible in background with stickers applied, lifestyle product photography
mockups.notes: Low-cost accessory product. High margin, impulse buy. Bundle with tee orders.

mockups.mockup_prompt: Interior design mockup of a square gallery-wrapped canvas on a white wall above a modern console table, the canvas shows surreal twilight clouds with golden eyes embedded within, warm ambient room lighting, home decor photography style, premium art presentation
mockups.notes: Premium product. Higher price point ($45-65). Art buyer audience.

mockups.mockup_prompt: Product photography of a navy blue t-shirt on a model outdoors at twilight, front view, square vector cloud design with geometric eye symbols on chest, muted blue and cyan palette blends with shirt color, atmospheric lifestyle photography
mockups.notes: V2 vector scales well for apparel. Navy integrates with the color palette.

mockups.mockup_prompt: Lifestyle mockup of a natural cotton tote bag being carried by a person in an urban setting, the bag features a centered vector cloud-and-eye design in muted blue tones, artsy casual style photography, natural daylight
mockups.notes: Art-market crossover product. Pairs well with canvas print for bundle.

mockups.mockup_prompt: Product photography of a black t-shirt on a model in dark studio with purple ambient lighting, front view, centered sacred geometry mandala with tech symbols in cyan and purple linework on chest, edgy streetwear photography, symmetrical design prominent
mockups.notes: Hero product for this theme. Symmetrical design = perfect center placement.

mockups.mockup_prompt: Close-up product photo of a holographic circular sticker on a laptop lid, sacred geometry data grid mandala design catching rainbow light refractions, iridescent holographic material, clean product photography on dark background
mockups.notes: Holographic material + mandala geometry = high perceived value. $4-6 price point.

mockups.mockup_prompt: Interior lifestyle mockup of a large square tapestry hung on a white wall in a bohemian-styled room, intricate sacred geometry mandala with circuit board patterns in purple and cyan on dark background, ambient fairy lights, meditation space aesthetic
mockups.notes: Large format mandala tapestries are a proven category. $25-40 price point.

mockups.mockup_prompt: Product photography of a phone case on a dark reflective surface, the case features an intricate sacred geometry data grid mandala in purple and cyan, symmetrical design centered on the case back, premium matte finish, studio lighting
mockups.notes: Symmetry centers perfectly on phone cases. Offer for iPhone + Samsung.

mockups.mockup_prompt: Gallery mockup of a large 24x36 portrait poster in a minimal black frame on a dark wall with dramatic spotlight, the poster shows an epic cosmic eye gazing down at a glowing Earth with electric blue light beam, cinematic scale, premium art gallery presentation
mockups.notes: Flagship product for T-06. Premium price point ($25-45). Matte or satin paper.

mockups.mockup_prompt: Product photography of a black pullover hoodie on a model from behind, large back print of a stylized giant eye with geometric rays extending down to a globe wireframe, electric blue on black, urban streetwear photography, dramatic lighting
mockups.notes: Full back print hero. Front: small eye logo on left chest.

mockups.mockup_prompt: Interior mockup of a tall portrait canvas print on a modern apartment wall, cosmic all-seeing eye above a small glowing Earth in deep blues and electric blue, premium gallery-wrapped edges, contemporary home setting, warm ambient lighting
mockups.notes: Premium canvas. $50-80 price range. Target art/home decor buyers.
